messages.content: What are the main features of ComfyUI-AudioScheduler?
ComfyUI-AudioScheduler allows loading MP3 or WAV files, reading the amplitude over time, and previewing the shape of the graph.
What does the LoadAudio node do?
The LoadAudio node is responsible for loading audio files from a specified directory, supporting both MP3 and WAV formats.
How does the AudioToFFTs node process audio data?
The AudioToFFTs node performs Fast Fourier Transforms (FFTs) on the audio data to obtain frequency information.
What does the AudioToAmplitudeGraph node create?
The AudioToAmplitudeGraph node creates a graph of the amplitude in a specified frequency range for visualization purposes.
What operation does BatchAmplitudeSchedule perform?
BatchAmplitudeSchedule is an operation to calculate amplitude values from FFT data based on the specified operation and frequency range.
How does the ClipAmplitude node work?
The ClipAmplitude node clips the amplitude values of audio data by setting maximum and optional minimum allowed amplitude values.
What is the function of TransientAmplitudeBasic?
TransientAmplitudeBasic is designed to adjust amplitude data with transient characteristics, controlling attack, hold, and release behavior.
What does NormalizeAmplitude do?
NormalizeAmplitude normalizes the amplitude data, optionally inverting the normalized values.
How does the GateNormalizedAmplitude work?
GateNormalizedAmplitude gates the normalized amplitude data based on the specified threshold.
What is the purpose of the NormalizedAmplitudeDrivenString?
NormalizedAmplitudeDrivenString is designed to create a dynamic string of text driven by changes in the normalized amplitude of audio signals.
What does NormalizedAmplitudeToNumber convert?
NormalizedAmplitudeToNumber converts normalized amplitude data to float or integer values.
What does NormalizedAmplitudeToGraph produce?
NormalizedAmplitudeToGraph generates a graph to visualize the normalized amplitude data.
How does AmplitudeToNumber convert?
AmplitudeToNumber converts amplitude data to float or integer values.
What does AmplitudeToGraph display?
AmplitudeToGraph generates a graph to visualize the amplitude data.
